src:
Demoran una avioneta paraguaya en Tinogasta

03 Nov 2019, 00:11

Ayer a la tarde, efectivos de la Comisaría de Tinogasta observaron que una avioneta marca Vercraf bimotor habría aterrizado en una pista de la localidad, la cual no estaba habilitada.
De inmediato se convocó a personal del Escuadrón 23 de Gendarmería Nacional, quienes al llegar al lugar demoraron por unas horas a la aeronave y al piloto, que provenía desde el vecino país de Paraguay.
Según informaron desde la fuerza nacional, la avioneta habría descendido de emergencia en la zona, ya que se pudo corroborar mediante migraciones que el plan de vuelo tenía como destino la localidad de Fiambalá, donde tenía que buscar a una familia de corredores del Dakar. De todas formas, se activaron los protocolos antidrogas y con la ayuda del can detector de narcóticos se pudo corroborar que en la aeronave no había rastros de sustancias prohibidas.
text:
They delay a Paraguayan plane in Tinogasta

03 Nov 2019, 00:11

Yesterday afternoon, officers from the Tinogasta Police Station observed that a twin-engine Vercraf aircraft would have landed on a track in the town, which was not enabled.
Immediately the personnel of Squadron 23 of National Gendarmerie were summoned, who when arriving at the place delayed for a few hours the aircraft and the pilot, who came from the neighboring country of Paraguay.
As reported from the national force, the plane would have descended emergency in the area, since it could be corroborated by migrations that the flight plan was destined for the town of Fiambalá, where he had to look for a family of Dakar corridors. In any case, the anti-drug protocols were activated and with the help of the narcotics detector it was possible to confirm that there were no traces of prohibited substances on the aircraft.
